channel.title: Post your approved appeals here
channel.description:
Only post here if your ban appeal has worked. Do not post anything else than success ban appeals.
If i see anyone posting here something else i will punish him personally ;)

item.title: Post your approved appeals here
item.dc:creator: @Xerxes Xerxes
item.description:
@Xerxes wrote:

Ban reason.
Troublemaker.

Answer:
Ok ok, I will stop making trouble, what about carpets?

Result: Ban removed.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your approved appeals here
item.dc:creator: @ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff
item.description:
@ThatGuyWhoDoesStuff wrote:

Hi Echo Zero,

You have been caught attempting to steal another players password. This is a serious offence.

Our report abuse system means there is no chance of your getting away with breaking the rules anymore.

You have been permanently banned for password scamming.

You were caught saying the following:

echo_zero-> Give me pass

This is against our rules regarding password scamming.

Please refer to article number 3 in the rules:

Rule 3: Asking/trying to persuade another player to give you their password for any reason is against the rules and will not be tolerated.

The login/logout IP data shows that no other user had access to your account at the time of this incident - we take password scamming very seriously and do not tolerate these players within Runescape.

You will NOT be unbanned.

[br][size=1]Posted at: June 15, 2006, 11:30:45 am[/size][hr]Dear Echo Zero,

I have checked our records and it seems that someone else may have had access to this account at the time of the offence. I have therefore removed the blackmarks from your record. Please submit a Lost Password query via the Customer Support section; we will reinstate the character to the game once we have issued a new, secure password.

Please can you fill out a password support form on the main page, and provide as much information as possible, so we can be sure we are returning the account to its rightful owner.

  1. Go to http://www.runescape.com/
  2. Under Other Features towards the bottom right of the main menu, click on Password Support.
  3. Click on the Password Support link on the left.
    Read the instructions on how to fill in the form and remember to write down your query tracking ID.

It is a good idea to make yourself aware, if you have not already done so, of the security tips in our online manual at www.runescape.com. There are several handy hints for making sure your account remains secure in future.

Sincerely,
RuneScape Customer Support

On 10th March 2005 you sent us the following:

I am insulted. I am a kind man who would never comit anything that would break rules of any kind. The only explanation is that my account is used by dear friends and I will personaly make sure they never try this again. If you do not “unbann” me then I understand, but know you have made a mistake.

I used to pass word scam on a old account, damn good too. Anywho, Jagex is a bunch of idiots. I told them to check the IPs again for the time it happend and see if any other IPs were ever active. and since my bro played on it once; there was.

What Im trying to tell you is, if you get banned. Lie. They are stupid, and they will believe you.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your approved appeals here
item.dc:creator: @james james
item.description:
@james wrote:

[quote=“kiaz, post:2, topic:1134”]ok guys this worked for me untill i got caught macroing afterwards

Reason for ban:
Swearing at a Playermod coz he was a gai noob who got spoont by my main
dont lie

Appeal:
AwWw… comon jagex ya band me coz sum freakin guy got on my account started walking around and swearing at a player mod watz up wid dat… if u unban me i wll change my pass and make sure this does not repeat…[/quote]

dont lie…
